name: Old Brews & New Friends
description: The "Special Mix Recipe" salvaged from Dreamflux Reef contains the miraculous power to disturb Synesthesia Dreamscapes. You've become a drinksmith as invited and are about to encounter friends unexpectedly. Together, you will experience one fantastical escapade after another...
introduction:
◆ Introduction ◆
A mysterious "Special Mix Recipe" has found its way into your hands. Invited to become a drinksmith at the Dreamjolt Hostelry, you'll welcome friends, craft drinks, and gradually unravel the secrets of the recipe.

◆ Event Rules ◆
● During the event, the Trailblazer will set up a makeshift bar at the Dreamjolt Hostelry to serve 5 groups of guests. When serving guests, you can prepare drinks with special effects according to the "Special Mix Recipe."
● Business operations are divided into two phases: "Business Hours" and "Extra Hours."
● During "Business Hours," you can serve guests according to 1 "Special Mix Recipe."
● Each "Special Mix Recipe" has 2 effects: one known effect and one unknown effect.
● Once you complete at least 1 effect, you can serve the next group of guests.
● During "Extra Hours," you can invite each group to taste 1 additional surprise drink.
● After tasting the drinks, guests will leave their reviews.

◆ Event Rewards ◆
● Complete welcoming the guests and restore recipes to receive rewards.
